settings.title: Settings
settings.helpTranslation: Please Help us translate to your language at <0>TranslateWiki</0>

login.title: Let's get started
login.afterLoginRedirect: After this process, you will be redirected back to the following page:
login.loginDisclaimer: By logging in, you agree to our <0>Terms of Service</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

campaign.name: Name
campaign.publicVisibilityDisclaimer: This Campaign would shown to the public (people other than coordinators, jury, project leaders)

round.confirmChangeStatus: Are you sure you want to mark this round as {{status}}?
round.quorumRequired_one: Single jury per submission is required
round.quorumRequired_two: Two juries per submission are required

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At CampWiz NXT, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines what information we collect, why we collect it, and how we use it.

infoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoWeCollect.intro: We only collect the following publicly available information:
infoWeCollect.registrationDate: Date of Registration on Wikimedia projects
infoWeCollect.ipAddress: Public IP Address for using our tool
infoWeCollect.outro: This information is essential for CampWiz NXT to function properly, including managing campaigns, verifying user eligibility, and maintaining fairness.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.authentication: Authentication – to verify your identity during sessions (Using OAuth2.0)
cookies.authorization: Authorization – to determine access levels and features based on your role (Using JWT Token)
cookies.outro: We do not use cookies for tracking, advertising, or analytics.

monitoring.title: User Activity Monitoring
monitoring.intro: To detect abuse and ensure fair usage of the platform, we monitor user actions such as:
monitoring.outro: However, we do not monitor which jury evaluated which submission, or the scores they gave. Jury evaluations remain private within the system and are not linked to individual evaluators for monitoring purposes.

errorMonitoring.title: Error Monitoring and Performance
errorMonitoring.intro: To prevent abuse and improve system performance, we use Sentry ™, an error tracking and performance monitoring service.
errorMonitoring.dataIntro: We send the following limited data to Sentry™:
errorMonitoring.noIp: Sentry™ does not receive your IP address or any personally identifiable information. We've configured Sentry to avoid tracking or storing data that could compromise your privacy.
errorMonitoring.learnMore: For more information, please refer to Sentry™'s Privacy Policy: <0>https://sentry.io/trust/privacy/</0>.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Retention
dataSharing.noSell: We do not sell, share, or disclose your account data to any third parties not mentioned in this policy. But we do provide submission results to the appropriate rightholders to use in any way they want with best of our intentions to be <0>good faith.
dataSharing.internalUse: Data is only used internally for campaign and jury processes.
dataSharing.retention: We retain data only for as long as it's needed to support the functionality of CampWiz NXT.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Because we only use publicly available and minimal information, we do not store sensitive personal data. If you have any questions or concerns about your data or privacy, please contact us at <0>support@wikilovesfolklore.org</0>.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to CampWiz NXT. By using our services, you agree to the following Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our platform.

eligibility.title: 1. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must have an active Wikimedia account to use CampWiz NXT. The username and date of registration must be publicly visible.

acceptableUse.title: 2. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: You agree not to misuse CampWiz NXT. This includes, but is not limited to:
acceptableUse.exploiting: Exploiting bugs or vulnerabilities in the system
acceptableUse.unauthorized: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to data

userData.title: 3. User Data
userData.content: We only collect publicly available Wikimedia usernames and registration dates. Your data is used solely for campaign and jury process functionalities. Refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> for more information.

monitoring.title: 4. Monitoring and Abuse Prevention
monitoring.intro: To maintain fairness and prevent abuse, we may monitor the following activities:
monitoring.outro: Jury evaluations and scores are not monitored or associated with individual jury members.

serviceAvailability.title: 5. Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: We strive to keep CampWiz NXT online and functional, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may suspend access for maintenance, updates, or in case of abuse.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: CampWiz NXT is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any issues arising from the use of the platform, including data loss or access issues.

immunity.title: 7. Immunity Clause
immunity.content: The developers, maintainers, and affiliates of CampWiz NXT are not responsible for the misuse of the tool by its users, nor for the decisions made during campaign management or jury evaluations. By using this platform, you agree not to hold us liable for actions performed by third parties, including but not limited to organizers, jurors, or participants in any campaign hosted via CampWiz NXT.

changes.title: 8. Changes to These Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes are posted implies acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, contact us at <0>support@wikilovesfolklore.org</0>.

error.accessDeniedToProject: You don't have access to this project
